## FileTree.IFileTreeDirectoryItem.getChildren() method

Gets the children of the directory.

**Signature:**


**Returns:**

Result&lt;ReadonlyArray&lt;[FileTreeItem](./ts-json-base.filetree.filetreeitem.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;
